page.title: 15KINNEFF VILLAGE CHURCH
page.content: In {KINNEFF CHURCH}there are approximately 300 in the congregation. About 30_35 go every Sunday. On average there are 4 funerals, 10 christenings and 6 marriages a year. The church is always open and holds a service each Sunday.Between 10 and 20 children attend Sunday school.10 teenagers attend Bible Class, where there is one leader. Since the church was built in 1843 there have been 7 ministers. Our minister has been here for just over 2 years. He is in charge of Arbuthnott church too. There is a plan for the future to link Kinneff, Arbuthnott with Inverbervie churches. There are 8 elders, 2 of them are women. Kinneff Church is {PRESBYTERIAN.}Communion is held twice a year. The congregation is responsible for the church bills but the{CHURCH of SCOTLAND}helps.
